t: How much does it cost to sell with Amazon?

t: Quantity Limit - Amazon Customer Service

t: Is there a maximum price for an item on Amazon? - Quora
s: Answer: There is no maximum price for an item on Amazon. Sellers are free to list their items at any price they choose, and buyers are free to decide whether or not they want to purchase the item at the listed price. Some items may have very high prices due to their rarity, collectibility, or oth...
